Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-43800 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-43800 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package reaper is earlier than 3.1.1-13, affected by CVE-2024-43800
